txt.en:
'You there, with the sword. Or is that an axe? Or a big rock? I can't see very well. Anyway, you look tough.

'Some of the sekbiri from up north strayed close to the gate last week. Thankfully no one got hurt. Well, except for Itho and nobody likes him anyway.

'The town's promised some funds to the idiot -- I mean brave soul -- who's willing to cull down their numbers.'
Sekbiri have attacked Zamarzîr. A local guard would like to cull down their numbers to prevent another attack from happening.
A worried guard at the gate of Halrax has asked you to cull down the sekbir population in their den on the north side of the island.\n\nSekbiri may be found at Ghar Jâdam to the north of Zamarzîr.
